discore.help¶

Represents the help class and all side-utilities related to the help

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

EmbedHelpCommand

represents a discord.py help system

Bases: discord.ext.commands.HelpCommand

represents a discord.py help system

Return the destination of the help message

Returns:

the destination of the help message

Set the footer of the help message

Parameters:

embed – the embed where to put the default message

Parameters:

mapping – contains unused informations

async command_not_found(string)¶

Return a message error when no corresponding command is found

Parameters:

string – the called unknown command, cog or group

Returns:

the message to send

async subcommand_not_found(command, string)¶

Return a message error when no corresponding subcommand is found

Parameters:

  • command – the base command

  • string – the unknown subcommand

Returns:

the message to send
